Extensions/Alamofire/DataRequest.html#/s.name: responseCC(_:queue:)
Extensions/Alamofire/DataRequest.html#/s.abstract: Wraps Alamofire.Response from Alamofire.response(queue:) as CancellablePromise<(Foundation.URLRequest, Foundation.HTTPURLResponse, Foundation.Data)>

Extensions/Alamofire/DataRequest.html#/s.name: responseStringCC(queue:)
Extensions/Alamofire/DataRequest.html#/s.abstract: Wraps the response from Alamofire.responseString(queue:) as CancellablePromise<(String, PromiseKit.PMKAlamofireDataResponse)>. Uses the default encoding to decode the string data.

Extensions/Alamofire/DataRequest.html#/s.name: responseJSONCC(queue:options:)
Extensions/Alamofire/DataRequest.html#/s.abstract: Wraps the response from Alamofire.responseJSON(queue:options:) as CancellablePromise<(Any, PromiseKit.PMKAlamofireDataResponse)>. By default, the JSON decoder allows fragments, therefore ‘Any’ can be any standard JSON type (NSArray, NSDictionary, NSString, NSNumber, or NSNull). If the received JSON is not a fragment then ‘Any’ will be either an NSArray or NSDictionary.

Extensions/Alamofire/DataRequest.html#/s.name: responsePropertyListCC(queue:options:)
Extensions/Alamofire/DataRequest.html#/s.abstract: Wraps the response from Alamofire.responsePropertyList(queue:options:) as CancellablePromise<(Any, PromiseKit.PMKAlamofireDataResponse)>. Uses Foundation.PropertyListSerialization to deserialize the property list. ‘Any’ is an NSArray or NSDictionary containing only the types NSData, NSString, NSArray, NSDictionary, NSDate, and NSNumber.

Extensions/Alamofire/DataRequest.html#/s.name: responseDecodableCC(_:queue:decoder:)
Extensions/Alamofire/DataRequest.html#/s.abstract: Wraps the response from Alamofire.responseDecodable() as CancellablePromise<(Decodable)>. The Decodable is used to decode the incoming JSON data.

Extensions/Request.html#/s:9Alamofire7Re.name: isCancelled
Extensions/Request.html#/s:9Alamofire7Re.abstract: true if the Alamofire request was successfully cancelled, false otherwise
